Package it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.character.advanced

Class AdvancedCharacter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.character.Character
it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.character.advanced.AdvancedCharacter
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bard, Bartender, Centaurus, Flagman, Healer, Jester, Knight, Landlord, Merchant, Monk, Postman, Princess
public abstract class AdvancedCharacter extends Character
An abstract class to represent all the 12 character cards.

    • incrementCardCost

      public void incrementCardCost()
      Increment by 1 the cost of the character if it has not been already incremented before, otherwise it remains the same.

    • getRandomCard

      public static AdvancedCharacter getRandomCard(Game game, List<AdvancedCharacter> alreadyPresent)
      Extract a random advanced character from all the possibles.
      Parameters:
      game - the game instance decorated by the advanced character.
      alreadyPresent - already picked advanced characters (3 different characters have to be picked at the beginning of an expert game).
      Returns:
      the randomly picked advanced character.

    • playEffect

      public abstract boolean playEffect(Object... attributes)
      Plays the effect of the advanced character.
      Parameters:
      attributes - the arguments requested by the character in order to be successfully played.
      Returns:
      true whether the effect of the card has been played without any error, otherwise false.

    • validateArgs

      protected abstract boolean validateArgs(Object... attributes)
      Returns true if the arguments are correct in order to play the effect of the advanced character, otherwise false.
      Parameters:
      attributes - the arguments to check passed to the character in order to play his effect.
      Returns:
      true if the attributes are correct in order to play the effect of the card without errors, otherwise false.
